title: Christ Jesus Lay in Death's Strong Bands

lyrics.text:
Christ Jesus lay in death's strong bands, for our offenses given; but now at God's right hand he stands, and brings us life from heaven;
wherefore let us joyful be, and sing to God right thankfully loud songs of Alleluia! Alleluia!

So let us keep the festival whereto the Lord invites us; Christ is himself the joy of all, the Sun that warms and lights us.
By his grace he doth impart eternal sunshine to the heart; the night of sin is ended! Alleluia!

author: Martin Luther (1524)
